news.title: Zirakpur illegal colonies probe exposes the rot
news.para: Four Zirakpur housing societies have made illegal constructions flouting the master plan, according to findings of an ongoing inquiry by additional deputy commissioner (ADC) Komal Mittal.

news.title: NCRPB proposes eight greenfield townships in Uttar Pradesh, Haryana & Rajasthan
news.para: ​​It says such cities may have smart elements like land allotment, e-land, smart water and electricity, central smart command system, 24X7 security, rain water harvesting and net zero water consumption areas.

news.title: Noida authority to rope in consultant for land acquisition to develop satellite town
news.para: The private agency, which will act as the land acquisition facilitating consultant (LAFC), will be also assigned the work of regularising the village abadi land and identify individuals responsible for encroachments, infringement and deviations of the building rules and regulations, officials said.

news.title: BMC to appoint fire & life safety auditors for low-rise buildings
news.para: ​​“The auditor will issue a fire safety compliance certificate in a prescribed format along with a schematic drawing showing various safety measures provided as per the codified fire safety requirements," an official said.

news.title: Bengaluru: Homebuyers upset as builders get longer project deadline
news.para: City homebuyers are a long way from home, penalised while waiting, as builders push deadlines and K-RERA issues extensions

news.title: NBCC to appoint Anarock as channel partner to sell Amrapali flats
news.para: NBCC had invited bids from property consultants to take over the sale of housing units of Amrapali Group valued at Rs 2,182.57 crore along with 21,897 sq ft of commercial space worth Rs 25 crore.

news.title: Property registrations decline in August in Mumbai
news.para: However, registrations continued to increase from a year earlier, because of a low base to compare with and purchases by women who are given a 1% cut in stamp duty.

news.title: Sebi to auction properties of Royal Twinkle, Citrus Check Inns on Sep 25
news.para: In a notice on Monday, the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Sebi) said it will auction as many as 97 properties of the companies on September 25 at a reserve price of more than Rs 350 crore.

news.title: Bombay HC says refund by builder to buyers under RERA order not liable to TDS
news.para: Several individuals who between 2015 and 2016 had booked flats in a real estate project at Malad (west) had sought orders from HC for recovery of arrears under a recovery warrant of 2018 passed by the Maharashtra Real Estate Regulatory Authority (MahaRERA) against the builders.

news.title: Plea in Delhi HC challenges clause of regulations for development of privately owned lands
news.para: The petitioner further said that the clause is in the nature of putting a restraint on the overall development of Delhi as it denies the regularisation of the existing structure on the privately-owned un-acquired land despite being in accordance with Unified Building Bye-Laws and Master Plan of Delhi.

news.title: SC verdict on Supertech's plea against demolition order of twin towers on Aug 31
news.para: On August 4, the top court had reserved its verdict on the batch of pleas while reprimanding NOIDA authority saying it is reeking with corruption and had connived with the builder over not providing the sanctioned plan to the homebuyers of Supertech's Emerald Court project.

news.title: Dubai developer Limitless set to agree third debt restructuring deal
news.para: It plans to enter into a lock-up agreement - a precursor to a long form term sheet and definitive documentation - with an ad-hoc group of creditors by the end of this month and with remaining creditors by the end of September to restructure the debt, an overview of the plan seen by Reuters showed.

news.title: Chandigarh housing board meet on need-based changes on September 8
news.para: Sources said the needbased changes matter will be discussed by keeping aspects like structural strength of houses, legal issues, and encroachments in mind. Officers will also share the current status.

news.title: Goa to seek one more month to ready coastal zone management plan
news.para: The state received 8,000 suggestions and objections on the CZMP from citizens during the July 8 public hearing. Different government agencies are working to verify these inputs.

news.title: Parsvnath Realcon starts construction of its stalled project in Delhi
news.para: Parsvnath Paramount consists of five towers including one separate Tower of EWS, having total 87 residential units in four towers and 45 units in EWS Tower.
